attributes.action: Ban plastic dog poo bags and promote the use of a biodegradable alternative.
attributes.additional_details:
I want a complete ban on the production and sale of plastic dog poo bags. 

As a keen environmentalist they are obviously a huge problem for me, wildlife and the environment.

I do regular litter picks and pick soo many used dog poo bags from out of trees and bushes, out of the canal or just on the road. It's a huge pollution issue that just doesn't really get mentioned. There are environmentally friendly, biodegradable alternatives available which need promoting if a ban gets implemented.
